80.description: The standard HTTP port the proxy server will listen to for requests.
80.label: HTTP Port

/usr/share/nginx/html.description: Choose a volume for static files.
/usr/share/nginx/html.label: Static Storage

VIRTUAL_HOST.description: Specify the virtual host name to add to the nginx proxy.
VIRTUAL_HOST.label: Virtual Host

NGINX_HOST.description: Specify the virtual host again for the default host.
NGINX_HOST.label: Default Host

Nginx Reverse Proxy Default Site (NXR).description: This NXR Rockon installs the offical Nginx docker image to use as the default site for the Nginx Web Proxy.
